PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_TankTypePressureVessel
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Common attributes of a pressure vessel.

PropertyDef.Name: ChargePressure
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or design operating pressure of the tank.

PropertyDef.Name: PressureRegulatorSetting
PropertyDef.Definition: Pressure that is automatically maintained in the tank.

PropertyDef.Name: ReliefValveSetting
PropertyDef.Definition: Pressure at which the relief valve activates.
